title: 神秘时代4
author: HC路人2
txt_content: 什么东西含有飞行要素和旅行要素？求解！尽可能便宜的！

replies.author: cesium_fluoride
replies.txt_content:
飞行只有鸡毛里有
旅行要素可以用船

replies.author: HC路人2
replies.txt_content:

replies.author: moshimowang18
replies.txt_content: 飞行 用羽毛  旅行用铁轨或者末影珍珠！

replies.author: Forsworn_
replies.txt_content: 飞行可以靠羽毛   旅行没记错的话可以用船？

replies.author: TC_XR
replies.txt_content:
